queries.query:
INSERT INTO TB_LANCAMENTO( ID_TITULAR, ID_DEPENDENTE, ID_CONTRATO, CD_MES, CD_ANO, VL_PRINCIPAL,
USER_CREATED, DT_ALTERED, DT_CREATED ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,
?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )

UPDATE TB_LANCAMENTO SET ID_TITULAR = ?, ID_DEPENDENTE = ?, ID_CONTRATO = ?, CD_MES = ?, CD_ANO = ?, VL_PRINCIPAL = ?,
USER_ALTERED = ?, DT_ALTERED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE ID = ?
delete from TB_LANCAMENTO where ID_CONTRATO = ? and CD_MES = ? and CD_ANO = ?
